description:
misc/dist: clean files from GOPATH after building tour

Fixes issue 5503.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=6083c3539707 ***

https://codereview.appspot.com/10989043/diff/1/misc/dist/bindist.go#newcode444
misc/dist/bindist.go:444: // Clean work files from GOPATH directory.
On 2013/07/08 01:18:45, r wrote:
> shouldn't you clean up even if there's an error?

Done.

damn, too late for a counter proposal. https://codereview.appspot.com/10761050
